name: Pill Chuger
description:
A junky game made by a junky person.

this game was developed without crunching and for the sole purpose of me having fun :)

it's far from perfect but I believe it's worth a shot!

The aim of the game is to gather the most amount of points, by shooting the blue pills on the blue guys and the red pills on the red guys. If you mess up a point will be deducted.

Controls:

WASD - moving

ESCAPE - toggle fullscreen 

mouse - aim

left mouse button - shoot blue pills

right mouse button - shoot red pills

ALT + f4 - quit ;)
